positions.title: Management Trainee: Operations transformation and strategy

experience.title: Production Management Intern
experience.description: •Supervised the production of 750 MT+ of welding wires of different grades by maintaining daily, weekly and monthly production reports.•Managed a workforce of 25 people engaged in various section of industry- wire drawing, acid washing, copper coating and packaging •Successfully established an automatic ring packaging machine saving Rs 30,000 / month equivalent to the salary of work of 2 labours.•Suggested and implemented modification of the plant layout for efficient space utilisation for inventory management which resulted in reduction of effective turn-around time of each truck by 10 minutes and increase in the storage space for welding flux and drums by 35%.
experience.description_html: •Supervised the production of 750 MT+ of welding wires of different grades by maintaining daily, weekly and monthly production reports.•Managed a workforce of 25 people engaged in various section of industry- wire drawing, acid washing, copper coating and packaging •Successfully established an automatic ring packaging machine saving Rs 30,000 / month equivalent to the salary of work of 2 labours.•Suggested and implemented modification of the plant layout for efficient space utilisation for inventory management which resulted in reduction of effective turn-around time of each truck by 10 minutes and increase in the storage space for welding flux and drums by 35%.

experience.title: Hardware Team Member
experience.description: •Designed drone with emergency parachute deployment mechanism and crash landing suspension mechanism in solidworks.•Designed and simulated Ornithopter with wing flapping mechanism; application of 4-R Mechanism to produce desired angle of wipe.•Designed and simulated package holding and locking mechanism underneath a drone for by applying screw and bolt mechanism.
experience.description_html: •Designed drone with emergency parachute deployment mechanism and crash landing suspension mechanism in solidworks.•Designed and simulated Ornithopter with wing flapping mechanism; application of 4-R Mechanism to produce desired angle of wipe.•Designed and simulated package holding and locking mechanism underneath a drone for by applying screw and bolt mechanism. <!---->

experience.title: Mechatronics team member
experience.description: •Did literature reivew of all past suspension mechanism designed and used by various space mission till now. •Designed and simulated suspension mechanism along with rocker bogie mechanism for University Rover Challenge 2021 using set of Bewel gears and lever.
